reporting-org.narrative: Local Development and small projects support

title.narrative: Training/coaching/organizational development of local councils

description.narrative: Helping several local councils in Western Aleppo Countryside in building their organisational capacity

title.narrative: Local councils more stabilized (human resources)- strengthened and more sustainable

title.narrative: Local councils strength proxy indicator* ( nb of projects* size of projects in $* nb of employees* existence of policies* trained management)

description.narrative: LCs strength is to be measured through the demonstartion of various factors that indicate- as a whole- the strenght of an LC. These factors are: • size of projects in $ • nb of projects • nb of employees • existence of policies • trained management each

title.narrative: % of increase of local community approval rate of the local councils

description.narrative: Local Council's employees job satisfaction ( in terms of salaries, security, sustainability, position, responsibilities, beniftis, work atmosphere, etc.) refelcts how much the empolyees are willing to commit and to deliver quality performance in their work. 3rd year 10% increase of the 2nd year
